```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE)
influence <- params$influence
```

```{r output}
m8a <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             # adoption_tri +
             # scale(n_tweets) +
             TF,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8b <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             # adoption_tri +
             # scale(n_tweets) +
             TS,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8c <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             # adoption_tri +
             # scale(n_tweets) +
            SB,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8d <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             #adoption_tri +
             scale(TF) + scale(TS) + scale(SB),
           #group,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8e <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             #adoption_tri +
             scale(TF) + scale(TS) + scale(SB) +
             group,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8f <- glm(post_n ~ 1 +
             #adoption_tri +
             scale(TF) + scale(TS) + scale(SB),
           #group,
           data = influence,
           family = 'poisson')

m8a %>% effectsize::standardize_parameters()
m8b %>% effectsize::standardize_parameters()
m8c %>% effectsize::standardize_parameters()
m8f %>% effectsize::standardize_parameters()

file_path = str_c("out/", "unweighted-final-models.doc")
sjPlot::tab_model(m8a, m8b, m8c, m8f, show.ci = FALSE, show.std=T, file = file_path)
```
